title: Best of The Herd: 10/30/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/30/2018
description:
Colin thinks we still don't give the Patriots enough credit for how long this dynasty has been going. He thinks Mike McCarthy makes sense as the next Browns head coach because things might not be salvageable in Green Bay. He reveals his Herd Hierarchy that does not have the Rams as the #1 team anymore. Plus, Albert Breer of The MMQB explains why some teams made moves at the NFL trade deadline. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
